name: New Tanks
description:
Welcome to New Tanks.



This is a game in which you have to break through the crowds of enemies. Many types of enemy units will not let you stand still. Dodge homing missiles, avoid the saw car, destroy the bomb before it catches up with you.



Various interesting locations
Many types of enemies
Bonus level with explosive chickens
Several different bosses.
Achievements, one secret achievement.
A complete level editor.
All this and much more awaits you in New Tanks
